metadata.synopsis: The player has tossed Baelen his backpack, but his teleportation scroll is no longer within it (most likely because the player has stolen it).

1.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
1.text: Just have to... where'd it go?
1.context: NodeContext: Baelen has his befuddled, pre-cure manner here.

0.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
0.text: I could've sworn I had that scroll.
0.context: NodeContext: Baelen has his befuddled, pre-cure manner here.
